comment.author: 55198937@N05
comment._content:
The long row of tall ships suggests they are colliers at Newcastle, (possibly Stockton), as here from Uni of Newcastle Cultural Collections:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/uon/5731942077/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/angeljim46] Thanks Andy, I think that Newcastle is highly likely. There are a few images (here and here) from the same collection that depict that region so that would make sense.
